The shots banged against Blot's head, knocking him a bit dizzy.

Blot: GRAA=
AA! Blot be soooooo madder than you are!

Blot fired each of his blasters (=
He has 2) twice at Cutthroat...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Lu=
rkerAbyss 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 09, 2001 3:=

  Subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets


  ::=
Cutthroat::
   
  Cutthroat: Now you fight too?  Harr, die!
   
  Cutthroat=
 did a 180 degree spin to the side, and the shot missed him.  Then, he took=
 his gun and fired 3 shots at Blot.

      ----- Origina=
l Message -----

      ::Cutthroat::
       
          =
  Cutthroat, being a copycat, and not wanting to lose an advantage, also tr=
ansformed to robot mode.  He stood still, and the 4 shits hit him in the ch=
est.  He looked a little dumbfounded for a moment, then whipped out his gun=
 and shot 4 shots back at Hun-Grr.
       
      OOC: Ok, I just said gun '=
cause I don't know what weapons Cutthroat has in robot mode.
